snippet: If analysts’ forecasts come true, higher dividend payouts will continue in 2012, as companies release more cash and try to win over investors.
abstract: Analysts forecast higher dividends in 2012, as companies release more cash and try to win over investors still hesitant about putting their money back into stocks; companies that pay high dividends were some of the best performers in 2011.
lead_paragraph: If analysts’ forecasts come true, higher dividend payouts will continue in 2012, as companies release more cash and try to win over investors.

headline.seo: Rising Dividends Expected in 2012 as Companies Woo Investors
headline.main: Dividends Rise in Sign of Recovery
headline.print_headline: Dividends Rise in Sign Of Recovery
